snippet: Marriott International said it had disabled the Wi-Fi's ad coding feature at two hotels: the Courtyard Marriott as well as its sister, the Residence Inn.
abstract: Marriott International said it had disabled the Wi-Fi's ad coding feature at two hotels: the Courtyard Marriott as well as its sister, the Residence Inn.

headline.main: Marriott Says It Stopped Ad Service Hidden in Wi-Fi
